Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Hainanenin 5 (natural AMPs; frog, amphibians, animals; XXU; 1S=S, UCSS1a)
Sequence Information.Source: skin secretions, Hainan cascade-frog,Amolops hainanensis; China, Asia

Literature Information.Literature: Activity: Wide-spectrum activity. Active against Gram+ S. aureus ATCC 2592 (MIC 18.8 ug/ml), S. aureus 090223 (MIC 2.3 ug/ml), S. aureus 1349+  (MIC 18.8 ug/ml), E. faecium 1299 (MIC 4.7 ug/ml), N. asteroides 090312 (MIC 18.8 ug/ml), Gram- A. sobria 090223 (MIC 9.4 ug/ml), X. maltophilia 090223 (MIC 4.7 ug/ml), P. mirabilis 090223 (MIC 9.4 ug/ml), A. baumannii 2178 or 2373 (MIC 9.4-18.8 ug/ml), K.pneumoniae 1373 (MIC >100 ug/ml), E. coli ATCC 25922 or 1342 (MIC 4.7-18.8 ug/ml), fungi S. mould 090223 (MIC 75 ug/ml), S. mould 090413 (MIC 9.4 ug/ml), C. glabrata 0902 (MIC 37.5 ug/ml), and C. albicans ATCC 2002 (MIC 2.3 ug/ml). Updated 7/2021
Literature Information.Author: Zhang S, Guo H, Shi F, Wang H, Li L, Jiao X, Wang Y, Yu H.2012
Literature Information.Title: Hainanenins: A novel family of antimicrobial peptides with strong activity from Hainan cascade-frog, Amolops hainanensis
